us.phonetic: /adj. əˈproʊpriɪt; v. -ˌeɪt/, (adj. ə prō′prē it; v. ə prō′prē āt′)

example.eg: The Johnsons are looking for an appropriate place to build their house.
example.egtrans: 约翰逊一家正在寻找一个合适的地方修建房子。

example.eg: Books about the Sesame Street characters are appropriate for the under 7 set.
example.egtrans: 有关《芝麻街》角色的书籍适合7岁以下儿童阅读。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…合适的, 适合（某人）的

example.eg: The treatment is appropriate for all types of hair loss.
example.egtrans: 该治疗方式适合所有类型的脱发。

example.eg: The General reacted as is appropriate to a man of his rank.
example.egtrans: 这名将军的反应与他自己的军衔相称。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…相一致的, 和…相称的

example.eg: The government will appropriate the property of people who do not pay taxes.
example.egtrans: 不交税者政府会没收其财产。

example.eg: Our school should appropriate funds to buy new computers.
example.egtrans: 我们学校应该拨款购买新电脑。

example.eg: The treasurer was appropriating the club's funds for his own use.
example.egtrans: 此财务主管不断地将俱乐部的资金挪作私用。
